subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Youkilis hit a two-run homer against Mike Parisi in the bottom of the 13th inning to lift the Boston Red Sox to a 5-3 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals on Sunday.
snippet: Kevin Youkilis hit a two-run homer against Mike Parisi in the bottom of the 13th inning to lift the Boston Red Sox to a 5-3 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals on Sunday.
